title: if tyler 1 gets reformed i deserve another chance im way less toxic
body: i am an old league player and this is my only account ever created i quit playing after i was banned and i understand why i was i was being a child .. 4 that i quit 4 a while aand now im back and ready to be gave another chance riot i have read the rules just incase ;D riot please reform me as a proud member of your community as humans we all deserve a second chance people can change ! !! thank you and have a great day

replies.body: I'm assuming by "tyler 1 gets reformed" you mean that if he gets unbanned for his improved behavior? While that may be a possibility, he will not get his banned accounts back. He as a player is banned, and if unbanned he'll be allowed to make new ones, but those other accounts are gone for good.
I'm curious. Where do the permabanned accounts go? Do they just litter the system forever?

Yeah like they said, nothing happens to them. The names actually can't even be used again, they don't open up through the Name Cleanup inactivity.

While it does seem like a waste of space, accounts may be unbanned due to a variety of reasons, such as a change in policy, a mistake that was found, player support makes an exception, or maybe the account was just locked due to a compromise and the owner recovers it. Deleting them destroys any possibility of that, so they don't do it.
Riot renames them and sells them to LoLSmurfs. :P
Yeah, every account is permanent unless you specifically request it to be deleted.

last time i appeal'd was 9 months ago and i understand why they didnt unban me but now ive took some time 2 reflect on my actions as an adult and im ready for a second chance ;D riot should understand i have read over the rule book so yes my behavior has improved alot THANKS FOR COMMENT !

Typically you'll hear from even Riot that they *never* repeal a legitimate permaban for toxic behavior, but once in a blue moon player support may be sympathetic towards a player that shows genuine reform. The chance is basically zero, but you can still submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask.
